subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Okay, I did it.

It's amazing stuff, but it's like you have to let it works itself. I think=
 Ron Ricketts is going to be really busy, there's people that see the You T=
ube videos that want boxes, so I give them the Paranormal Systems link.
 
 =
I could be making all those boxes, but somethings are more important, like =
using the boxes, and having time to experiment. I've like to get my own des=
ign out there, but I still haven't rsolved all the issues with it, nor answ=
ered al my questions about an ideal configuration. 
 
 Frank-S


To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups.comFrom: paranormalinvestigating@...: Thu, 22 Nov=
 2007 19:33:16 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Okay, I did it.




Frank,I know=
 exactly what you mean, during a session the other day I heard a small chil=
ds voice over the regular signal and it sounded like it was in the room wit=
h me. It actually gave me a chill. I going to post the file in the file sec=
tion in the folder marked 11-22-07.the files are both reverse files first w=
ord is forward second reversedbruce--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Su=
mption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:>> > Back in the days that I could play mor=
e--I used to get voices that were like 3-d, they would seeimly be infront o=
f the speaker, not sounding like they were coming from the speakers, if tha=
t makes any sense. I'm trying to dulpicate, or provide the raw audio that a=
llows those effects. > > Frank-s> > > To: EVP-ITC@...: piggsy@...: Thu, 22 =
Nov 2007 13:02:32 -0600Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Okay, I did it.> > > > > > It=
 will be interesting to hear responses in stereo.> > ----- Original Message=
 ----- > From: Frank Sumption > To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com > Sent: Thursda=
y, November 22, 2007 12:40 PM> Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Okay, I did it.> Okay=
. I'm mkaing one kinda based onthe Mini Box, just the linear mode, no sound=
 sound chamber, no mics. I have a Walkman board I'm using as a radio, which=
 has steroe outputs, so I'll have twin speakers, and dual channel line outp=
ut. Frank-S> > > To: EVP-ITC@...: lisby@...: Thu, 22 Nov 2007 10:10:01 -050=
0Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Okay, I did it.> > > I'm supposed to be in the lot =
made in the second week in January. I watched the demo for it last night an=
d it seems easy enough to understand, even for the technically braindead li=
ke me. That said, I'm going to have tuning issues I think, so I will be beg=
ging for advice. > > Happy Thanksgiving, Frank. Let the aliens have some tu=
rkey today, too!> > Ann> > > On Nov 22, 2007, at 1:47 AM, Frank Sumption wr=
ote:> > > > > Well at last! I just couldn't get it together on maufacturing=
 this stuff, and couldn't get all the bugs out--yet. I'm just not a busines=
s person, and not even an engineer. I don't think it was for me to produce =
that boxes, just get the concept out there. Interesting that a non profit o=
utfit is making it. That's not to say they give theirs away free either. I =
am very pleased that someone out not only comprehends how the box is suppos=
ed to work, but can make it available. It is a relief to me! Frank-S> > > T=
o: EVP-ITC@...: lisby@...: Wed, 21 Nov 2007 15:06:31 -0500Subject: [EVP-ITC=
] Okay, I did it.> > > I just preordered a minibox.In January, looks like, =
I will finally get my chance to play, too. ;)Ann> > Share life as it happen=
s with the new Windows Live. Share now! > > > Get the power of Windows + We=
b with the new Windows Live. Power up! > > > > > > > > ____________________=

itself. I think Ron Ricketts is going to be really busy, there's =

anormal Systems link.<BR>
 <BR>
 I could be making all those boxe=
s, but somethings are more important, like using the boxes, and having time=
 to experiment. I've like to get my own design out there, but I still haven=
't rsolved all the issues with it, nor answered al my questions about an id=
eal configuration. <BR>
